page.title: 07CASTLEMILK AMENITIES
page.content:
When we heard that we were to go to { {Castlemilk}for the DOMESDAY PROJECT we wondered what we'd be in for. Not many of us had ever been there, but we had certainly heard all about it!!
To us {Castlemilk}means {Gang Warfare} Drugs{Glue Sniffing}and Vandalism. As we drove and walked about we began to realise that there is very little for people to do.
{Castlemilk}is an enormous housing scheme but up until last year there wasn't even a {PUB}. The new Pub is called {the OASIS}which we all thought was a good idea, as it is the only "watering hole" in a sort of desert.
